name: Zombies Fall 2: Hungry Temple Plant Edition
name_original: Zombies Fall 2: Hungry Temple Plant Edition
description:
Check out this fun tap the zombies game before they get eaten by the plant.

Tap the zombies to make them fly away or they'll be eaten by the hungry plant. Make sure you click on the right zombie. Each one has its own special powers can make the difference between life or death.

Try it out today!
